textContent:
---eyebags---

For context, I'm writing this while you prep to sleep because you jgh from work. I told you I couldn't sleep anymore kaya mag siesiesta nalang ako mamaya hahaha. Pero the truth is, I just simply find the idea of talking to you, even if just for a few minutes, more alluring than sleep. And if magka-eyebags man ako dahil don hahahah, then that's okay. I'll just think of them as a testament to how much I like you.

---endearments---

I still couldn't get over you calling me with various different endearments. Ilang beses ko na inuulit ulit basahin, nakakakilig parin talaga hahaha. The feeling is really weird and funny and addicting hahaha. I do feel guilty about not being able to be as good at endearments as you are. I really am. I'm sure you've noticed how I malfunction whenever you say addicting sweet words to me (duh), and while sometimes it might seem exaggerated (and sometimes it is, for comic relief), I really do have a hard time expressing and processing those words. I like you so much Rei (side note: why is your name so wonderful, i really do like saying it. Rei. Rei. Rei.), so the thought that you reciprocate my feelings make me really speechless sometimes. So please, give me time!!! One day magsasawa ka sa kakatawag ko sayo ng babe, bbcakes, happypill, etc. HAHAHAHAH 

Also, quick trivia (or as you might call it, raph lore), dati pa ata talaga ako di sanay sa mga endearments hahaha. Narealize ko kase napaisip ako bigla ano madalas na tawag ko sa mga nakatalking stage ko dati HAHAHAHAH. Mare, kumare, mars, marecakes, tas pag nagtritrip ako, pre HAHAHA. Parang pang kaibigan lang talaga amp hahahahah.
title: January 7, 2024
textContentHtml:
---eyebags---


For context, I'm writing this while you prep to sleep because you jgh from work. I told you I couldn't sleep anymore kaya mag siesiesta nalang ako mamaya hahaha. Pero the truth is, I just simply find the idea of talking to you, even if just for a few minutes, more alluring than sleep. And if magka-eyebags man ako dahil don hahahah, then that's okay. I'll just think of them as a testament to how much I like you.


---endearments---


I still couldn't get over you calling me with various different endearments. Ilang beses ko na inuulit ulit basahin, nakakakilig parin talaga hahaha. The feeling is really weird and funny and addicting hahaha. I do feel guilty about not being able to be as good at endearments as you are. I really am. I'm sure you've noticed how I malfunction whenever you say addicting sweet words to me (duh), and while sometimes it might seem exaggerated (and sometimes it is, for comic relief), I really do have a hard time expressing and processing those words. I like you so much Rei (side note: why is your name so wonderful, i really do like saying it. Rei. Rei. Rei.), so the thought that you reciprocate my feelings make me really speechless sometimes. So please, give me time!!! One day magsasawa ka sa kakatawag ko sayo ng babe, bbcakes, happypill, etc. HAHAHAHAH 


Also, quick trivia (or as you might call it, raph lore), dati pa ata talaga ako di sanay sa mga endearments hahaha. Narealize ko kase napaisip ako bigla ano madalas na tawag ko sa mga nakatalking stage ko dati HAHAHAHAH. Mare, kumare, mars, marecakes, tas pag nagtritrip ako, pre HAHAHA. Parang pang kaibigan lang talaga amp hahahahah.
